title: [W]Strike out all or part of the claim

content.text: [W]You can request that the tribunal strike out all or parts of the claim.
[W]If something is ‘struck out’ it is removed from the claim or response and cannot be relied upon.
[W]The tribunal can strike out all or parts of the claimant’s claim on their own initiative or after a request from the respondent.
[W]A strike out request must be based on at least one of the grounds of Rule 37 of the Employment Tribunals Rules of Procedure.
Manylion i’w cynnwys yn eich cais:

items: [W]why you think the claim (or parts of it) should be struck out
[W]which ground or grounds in Rule 37 you say applies in this case
[W]if you are referring to numbered points or paragraphs in a claim, include these numbers or other references
